0.9.name: wordpress/custom-post-type-order
0.9.description:
Add a page on admin for order items for each hierarchical custom post type This plugin allow the same thing of "My Order Page", but for each hierarchical custom type !

Contrary to the plugin "My Order Page", you can modify the order and the hierarchy at one time. The drag and drop works as the menus of WordPress 3.0

The effect JavaScript is a little bit sensitive for the moment, it is not always easy to control the movements. If a kind soul wishes to improve the behavior, I am a buyer in 100 %!
